程序包 cardgame

类 GameRegle

java.lang.Object
cardgame.GameRegle
public class GameRegle
extends java.lang.Object
It is the class of game modes.

  • 构造器概要

    This is the constructor of GameRegle with parameter.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • GameRegle

      public GameRegle​(int p, int l, int m)
      This is the constructor of GameRegle with parameter. It contains the level, the shape of chessboard and number of players.
      参数:
      p - The number of people
      l - The level you want to play
      m - the shape of chess board you wants to play

  • 方法详细资料

    • SetPeople

      public void SetPeople​(int p)
      Set the number of players.
      参数:
      p - The number of people

    • SetpLevel

      public void SetpLevel​(int l)
      Set the level of the game.
      参数:
      l - The level you want to play

    • SetMap

      public void SetMap​(int m)
      Set the shape of the chessboard.
      参数:
      m - the shape of chess board you wants to play

    • GetPeople

      public int GetPeople()
      返回:
      the number of players.

    • GetLevel

      public int GetLevel()
      返回:
      the level you have chosen.

    • GetMap

      public int GetMap()
      返回:
      the shape of the chessboard you have chosen.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      We use String toString() methode to show the mode you have chosen to play.
